tasks.task: Complete 3 cardio workouts of at least 30 minutes each.
tasks.requirement: Screenshots from a fitness tracking app (e.g., Strava, Fitbit, Apple Health) showing 3 distinct workout sessions, each with a duration of at least 30 minutes.

tasks.task: Prepare and consume 5 healthy, home-cooked meals (lunch or dinner).
tasks.requirement: Photos of 5 distinct healthy, home-cooked meals.

tasks.task: Track all food intake for 3 days using a food tracking app.
tasks.requirement: Screenshots from a food tracking app (e.g., MyFitnessPal, Cronometer) showing daily nutritional summaries for 3 distinct days.

tasks.task: Complete 4 cardio workouts of at least 35 minutes each.
tasks.requirement: Screenshots from a fitness tracking app (e.g., Strava, Fitbit, Apple Health) showing 4 distinct workout sessions, each with a duration of at least 35 minutes.

tasks.task: Prepare and consume 7 healthy, home-cooked meals (lunch or dinner).
tasks.requirement: Photos of 7 distinct healthy, home-cooked meals.

tasks.task: Complete 2 strength training sessions of at least 20 minutes each.
tasks.requirement: Photos of yourself performing an exercise during each of the 2 sessions, clearly indicating the activity (e.g., dumbbells in hand, yoga mat).
